-u.option: Command-switch. When set, processed database structures will be uploaded to firebase database

-i.option: Name of file contianing datadump from NOBIL, /path/to/inputfile

-s.option: Command-switch. When set, subscription datastructure in database will be reinitialized. This may result in loss of previously iadded subscriptons

-h.option: This program process database dump from NOBIL and parse the dump into JSON structure and optionally upload the structure to firebase database used by for LadeApp

-k.option: API key used to access NOBIL database

-n.option: Command-switch. When set, fresh database will be downloaded from nobil.no. If not set, inputfile is used.

-c.option: Path to file holding credentials (private key) for service account to use to connect to firebase database

-q.option: Path to file holding NOBIL API query in JSON format - used by the database download process.
